meanings.sent1: The nonfluid mud made it hard to walk through the field.
meanings.sent2: The nonfluid traffic caused a long delay on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The nonfluid paintbrush refused to glide smoothly on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfluid movements on the dance floor resembled a robot.
meanings.sent5: The nonfluid stream of words from the nervous speaker was hard to follow.

meanings.sent1: The nonfluid concrete had already hardened in the mold.
meanings.sent2: The nonfluid lava cooled rapidly upon contact with the air.
meanings.sent3: The nonfluid thoughts in his mind seemed stuck in place.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfluid emotions were like a frozen lake, unmoving and cold.
meanings.sent5: The nonfluid syrup in the bottle refused to pour out easily.

meanings.sent1: The nonfluid dough required more water to become pliable.
meanings.sent2: The nonfluid gelatin had set into a firm jelly.
meanings.sent3: The nonfluid mixture of ingredients resulted in a lumpy texture.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfluid hair gel kept her hairstyle in place all day.
meanings.sent5: The nonfluid clay was difficult to shape into the desired form.
